title: Sen. Tommy Tuberville won't lift his military blockade amid Israel-Hamas conflict
description: The office of Sen. Tommy Tuberville, R-Ala., said he isn’t backing down on his monthslong blockade on hundreds of military promotions, even amid Hamas’ deadly attack on Israel, a close U.S ally.

title: Nikki Haley calls Antony Blinken ‘irresponsible’ for failing to connect U.S. money to Hamas attack on Israel
description: Nikki Haley pushed back after Secretary of State Antony Blinken said that the Biden administration does not have any evidence of Iran's direct involvement in the Israel-Hamas conflict.

title: Vast hostage crisis grips Israel after Hamas attack
description: A hostage crisis — punctuated by graphic and bloody videos appearing to show militants abducting Israelis — continued to unfold on Sunday as Hamas’ attack on Israel entered a second day.

title: Israel strikes Gaza after Hamas attack in photos
description: Photos: Israel strikes Gaza after Hamas attack

title: How Biden administration is responding to the attack against Israel
description: Meet the Press moderator Kristen Welker joins Sunday TODAY’s Willie Geist to weigh in on how the Biden administration is responding to the Hamas attack on Israel and how it will impact U.S. politics.

title: Why did Hamas attack Israel, and what happens next?
description: NBC News analyst Jeremy Bash joins Sunday TODAY’s Willie Geist to weigh in on the devastating surprise attack by Hamas against Israel and what will happen next with the fight.

title: How Israel was caught off guard by terrorist attacks by Hamas
description: After Israel suffered devastating attacks on Saturday, there is finger-pointing in the intelligence community after the Palestinian militant group Hamas caught the country by surprise and deeply unprepared. NBC’s Molly Hunter reports for TODAY.

title: Two months of fire and flood: Greece’s climate disasters, visualized
description: Greece has suffered a relentless two months of climate change-related weather, including record-breaking rainfall and devastating wildfires. See the effects.

title: Gazans mourn death and destruction of Israeli airstrikes in response to Hamas attacks
description: Communities in Gaza City and Khan Younis mourned the loss of life and property after Israel responded to coordinated waves of Hamas attacks with airstrikes.

title: Lebanon's Hezbollah targets Israeli positions in occupied Golan Heights border region
description: Militant Hezbollah fighters in Lebanon fired dozens of rockets and shells at three Israeli positions in a disputed area along the country's border with the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights, early on Sunday.

title: Zelenskyy calls for solidarity with Israel, condemns Hamas attack
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy called on the world to stand in solidarity with Israel and condemned the unprecedented attack from Hamas, saying, “Anyone who brings terror and death must be held accountable.”

title: Dozens killed and injured in powerful earthquake and aftershocks in Afghanistan
description: A powerful magnitude-6.3 earthquake followed by strong aftershocks killed dozens of people in western Afghanistan on Saturday, the country’s national disaster authority said.
